content:
But will his new “family” hold together?

SEATED BELOW a giant screen plastered with the words “Towards a Common Sense Europe. People Rise Up”, Matteo Salvini (pictured, centre), Italy’s right-wing deputy prime minister, sought to fuse Europe’s divided populists of the right into a single, continent-wide movement ahead of next month’s European elections.

grande festa

ex: 网络 马迪奥；马特奥；马提欧
n. 大陆；洲；陆地；欧洲大陆（不包括英国和爱尔兰）
adj. 自制的；节欲的；禁欲的
网络 大洲
eg2: the continent of Africa
非洲大陆
the African continent
非洲大陆
We're going to spend a weekend on the Continent.
我们要去欧洲大陆度周末。

ex: n. 副手；代理；副职；（某些国家的）议员
adj. 副的
网络 代表；代理人
eg2: I'm acting as deputy till the manager returns.
我在经理回来之前代行他的职务。
the deputy head of a school
副校长

ex: n. 保险丝；导火线；引信
v. 给…装信管；给…装导火线；由于保险丝烧断而电路不通；熔接
网络 熔断器；迪芙斯；熔丝
eg2: to change a fuse
换保险丝
Check whether a fuse has blown.
检查一下保险丝是否烧断了。
He set the fuse to three minutes.
他把引信设定为三分钟起爆。
The bombs inside were on a one-hour fuse.
炸弹内装有一小时起爆的引信。
As they heal, the bones will fuse together.
骨头愈合时将会连接在一起。
Our different ideas fused into a plan.
我们不同的想法融合成一项计划。
The sperm fuses with the egg to begin the process of fertilization.
精子与卵子结合开始受精过程。
The two companies have been fused into a single organization.
两家公司合并成一个机构。
Atoms of hydrogen are fused to make helium.
氢原子可熔合成氦。
The lights have fused.
保险丝烧断，灯都灭了。
I've fused the lights.
我把保险丝烧断了，灯都灭了。
Is this plug fused?
这个插头有没有安装保险丝？

ex: n. 民族主义者；国家主义者；怀有本民族优越感者
adj. 国家主义的；民族主义的
网络 国民党
eg2: Scottish nationalists
苏格兰国家主义者

ex: n. 灰泥；膏药；熟石膏；建筑石膏
v. 抹灰于；往…上涂抹；把（头发）梳平；使（头发）粘在（头上）
网络 硬膏；硬膏剂；灰浆
eg2: an old house with crumbling plaster and a leaking roof
一所灰泥剥落、屋顶漏水的老房子
a plaster bust of Julius Caesar
一尊尤利乌斯 ) 凯撒的半身石膏塑像
She broke her leg a month ago and it's still in plaster .
她一个月前腿骨骨折，至今仍打着石膏。
She plastered herself in suntan lotion.
她往身上抹防晒液。
We were plastered from head to foot with mud.
我们浑身上下都沾满了泥。
His wet hair was plastered to his head.
他那湿透的头发紧贴在头皮上。
Her bedroom wall was plastered with photos of him.
她卧室的墙上贴满了他的照片。
She had photos of him plastered all over her bedroom wall.
她把他的照片贴满了卧室的墙。
The next day their picture was plastered all over the newspapers.
第二天，他们的照片被刊登在各家报纸上。

wp.Populist Party: 平民党;人民党;人民主义党
wp.Populist Nationalism: 民粹民族主义;民粹式民族主义

ex: n. 平民主义者；民粹派；平民论者
adj. 民粹主义的（等于populistic）；平民主义的；平民主义者的

wp.stroke unite: 卒中单元;开通卒中单元;中单元
wp.UNITE HERE: 劳工组织;酒店和制衣工会;成衣酒店联合工会;工会联盟

ex: vt. 使…混合；使…联合；使…团结
vi. 团结；联合；混合
eg2: Whatever befell, we must  as one.
无论发生什么事，我们必须团结一致。
Care must be taken to  with all those that can be united with.
必须注意团结一切可以团结的人。
And whether you voted for me, or you voted for Barack, the time is now to  as a single party with a single purpose.
不管你给我投了票，还是给巴拉克投了票，现在，作为一个党派团结起来，朝同一个目标奋斗的时刻来了。

Title: Matteo Salvini tries to unite Europe’s nationalists

paperStatistics.title: Matteo Salvini tries to unite Europe’s nationalists
paperStatistics.desc: But will his new “family” hold together?
